name: Boom Guys
description:
Are you ready for endless fun? Load your guns and join massive cartoon PVP battles in BOOM GUYS!

Multiplayer shooter games have never been so fun and easy! Just choose a battle with up to 32 players, pick your soldier, and BOOM!

BOOM GUYS features:
- Loads of characters: pick your guy, and pump up your skills and tactics to get to the top
- Customization: choose your look and weapon skins, dress up to stand out in every battle
- Heaps of battlegrounds: different maps and cartoon landscapes to choose from. Find your best way to BOOM!
- Easy peasy: no long loading times, no freezes, no wait — just three taps to a battle on any device!

Invite your friends and MAKE A HUGE BOOM!

BOOM GUYS on social media:
- Facebook https://www.facebook.com/BoomGuysMYTONA
- Instagram https://www.instagram.com/boomguysgame
- Twitter https://twitter.com/BoomGuysGame
